argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> H e. CH ) |
| 2 |  | #P_pjhth | |- ( H e. CH -> ( H +H ( _|_ ` H ) ) = ~H ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( H e. CH -> ( A e. ( H +H ( _|_ ` H ) ) <-> A e. ~H ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_biimpar | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> A e. ( H +H ( _|_ ` H ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_pjpjpre | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> A = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) ) |
